titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ikechukwu J. Ogujiofor, Joy I. Ogujiofor, and Godfrey I. Ogujiofor.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/25/1987--Introduced. Declares three named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
